definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: So it is normal for a burro to have some dirt in its coat.
sentences.chinese: 因此，馱驢的毛髮上有髒土污垢是很正常的。

sentences.english: That dirt very likely contained the common nightcrawler and the red marsh worm.
sentences.chinese: 那種髒土非常可能帶有地龍和紅蚯蚓。

sentences.english: This is the worst of all that has happened to me, to be filled with dirt and rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 我的不幸現在是到了極點，讓人裝起髒土垃圾來了。

sentences.english: They swapped English dirt for Virginia tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 他們用英國的髒土換取了弗吉尼亞的菸草。

sentences.english: He invited his neighbors to shovel dirt into the well.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他請來鄉親鄰居，鏟髒土投入井裏。
